about_the_game:
Bloba's Adventure - the game will immerse you in a rather mysterious story of a character named Bloba.

Chapter 1: Sewage

Bloba's life was boring and monotonous, when suddenly it began to change rapidly, Bloba increasingly had a terrible dream where he was running away from a mysterious figure in a hat.

Even more strongly, the life of the Bloba was brightened up by the appearance of a mouse - Kaklya. They had a lot of fun spending time together, but at some point everything turned into a nightmare. During a walk, Kaklya falls into the sewer due to an accident. Bloba goes in search of her, but he does not yet know what kind of problem he is in.

Chapter 2: Coming soon....

Chapter 3: Coming soon....

Gameplay

A game for a linear passage of the plot with riddles. Solve puzzles by switching between the main characters, and move on through this exciting story.

short_description: The game will immerse you in an incredibly exciting story, the main character of which is a very good-natured character named Bloba. One day, walking with his pet Kaklya, Bloba made a decision, the consequences of which turned out to be completely unpredictable, based on this, our adventure begins.
